Results.Title: Apprentice Dental Nurse
Results.ShortDescription: The role of a Dental Nurse is to assist the Dentist and also to ensure the experience of all patients is a good one. You need to be caring and have a natural smile that welcomes every patient.

Results.Title: NHS Apprentice Assistant Audiologist
Results.ShortDescription: A vacancy has arisen in our Hearing Services Centre for an Assistant Audiologist to undertake a range of duties in a caring environment contributing to the provision of a high quality service to patients. You will be required to assist qualified Audiologists during busy hearing aid repair clinics as well as providing a full range of admin duties.
Results.EmployerName: Sandwell and West Birmingham Hospitals NHS Trust

Results.Title: NHS Operating Department Apprentice / Theatre Apprentice
Results.ShortDescription: An exciting opportunity for a motivated and organised individual to join our friendly Operating Theatre Teams at City and Sandwell Hospitals. You will work in a clinical role to directly support theatre practitioners in providing a high standard of patient care in the Operating Department and to enable excellent provision of perioperative care.
Results.EmployerName: Sandwell and West Birmingham Hospitals NHS Trust

Results.Title: Apprentice Healthcare Assistant in Paediatrics at  Sandwell General Hospital.
Results.ShortDescription: Our Paediatric Team are now recruiting. Are you a caring and reliable person with a desire to work with children? If you have a passion to work in the NHS this fantastic opportunity for a Healthcare Assistant Apprenticeship could be right for you. This is a fantastic opportunity which will really bring your ambition to life!

Results.Title: Apprentice Dental Nurse
Results.ShortDescription: We have an exciting opportunity for an Apprentice Dental Nurse to join our friendly and busy dental practice. We are a dental practice with a well established and friendly team. We would love you to join us as an Apprentice Dental Nurse.

Results.Title: Apprentice Dental Assistant
Results.ShortDescription: Are you able to recognise that every patient has different needs and expectations, and pride yourself in the courteous service you would deliver to each person who walks through the doors of the practice? The role of a dental nurse is to assist the dentist and also to ensure the experience of all patients is a good one.

Results.Title: Advanced apprenticeship - Laboratory Technician (Metrology)
Results.ShortDescription: You will be highly trained to work in the world of manufacturing; the initial training will be broad based leading to a first appointment as a Laboratory Technician.

Results.Title: Apprentice Dental Nurse
Results.ShortDescription: You will be required to provide clinical support within 4 surgeries to 2 dentists, 3 hygienists and patients to ensure the visits are conducted in a professional and caring manner. Assist with reception or any clerical duties as required.

Results.Title: Dental Nurse Apprentice
Results.ShortDescription: Fantastic opportunity to train as a Dental Nurse. No previous experience or qualifications are required as full training will be provided. Working in a busy dental practice you will study and earn at the same time to become fully qualified.

Results.Title: Apprentice Dental Nurse
Results.ShortDescription: You will be required to provide clinical support to 2 dentists and ensure patients care is provided in a professional and caring manner. Assist with reception or any clerical duties as required.

Results.Title: Laboratory Technician Apprentice
Results.ShortDescription: You will be required to carry out basic school laboratory duties. In addition, you will support pupils in a variety of settings.

Results.Title: Advanced Apprentice - On site Calibration Engineer (Metrology)
Results.ShortDescription: You will be highly trained to work in the world of Metrology, the initial training will be broad based leading to a first appointment as a Calibration Engineer To ensure that customer equipment is calibrated in accordance with Rhopoint Metrology Services Quality Management System and any appropriate National/International Standards.
